fields.name: Day 1:
fields.value:
After 12 years of research, study, and preparation, I have finally been granted access to research the creatures up close in the field. I've created this digital journal to document my findings. Every day I'll upload my entries to the database so that the lab personnel can conduct research while I'm away. I've set up camp not too far from the helipad so I can be extracted if needed. I've finished my shelter, now it is time to rest. Goodbye.
Attack: None
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Research a target at night, receiving a description of their role written as a research journal log entry.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your info cannot be fooled by frames/detection immunity.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Town.
